00038 class macro extends rules 
00039 {   
00040     function parse ($rule_string)
00041     {
00042         $data = array();
00043         if (strpos($rule_string, "#")) {
00044             $data['comment'] = substr($rule_string, strpos($rule_string, "#") + '1');
00045             $rule_string =  substr($rule_string, '0', strpos($rule_string, '#'));
00046         }
00047 
00048         /*
00049          * Sanitize the rule string so that we can deal with '{foo' as '{ foo' in 
00050          * the code further down without any special treatment
00051          */
00052         $rule_string = preg_replace("/{/", " { ",   $rule_string);
00053         $rule_string = preg_replace("/}/", " } ",   $rule_string);
00054         $rule_string = preg_replace("/\(/", " \( ", $rule_string);
00055         $rule_string = preg_replace("/\)/", " \) ", $rule_string);
00056         $rule_string = preg_replace("/,/", " , ",   $rule_string);
00057         $rule_string = preg_replace("/\"/", " \" ", $rule_string);
00058 
00059         $rule_string = preg_replace("/=/", " = ",   $rule_string);
00060         $rule_string = preg_replace("/\"/", "",     $rule_string);
00061         foreach (preg_split("/[\s,\t]+/", $rule_string) as $rule) {
00062             $rules[] = $rule;
00063         }
00064 
00065         $i = '0';
00066         $data['identifier'] = $rules[$i++];
00067         if ($rules[++$i] != "{") {
00068             $data['value'] = $rules[$i];
00069         } else {
00070             while (preg_replace("/,/", "", $rules[++$i]) != "}") {
00071                 $data['value'][] = $rules[$i];
00072             }
00073         }
00074         return $data;
00075     }
00076 
00077     function generate ()
00078     {
00079         $data = "";
00080         if ($this->rules) {
00081             foreach ($this->rules as $rule) {
00082                 if (!count($rule)) {
00083                     continue;
00084                 }
00085                 if ($rule['type'] == 'comment') {
00086                     $lines = preg_split("/\n/", stripslashes($rule['comment']));
00087                     $data .= "\n";
00088                     foreach ($lines as $line) {
00089                         $data .= "# ". $line. "\n";
00090                     }
00091                     continue;
00092                 }
00093                 $data .= $rule['identifier']. " = \"";
00094                 if (!is_array($rule['value'])) {
00095                     $data .= $rule['value'];
00096                 } else {
00097                     $data .= "{ ";
00098                     foreach ($rule['value'] as $value) {
00099                         $data .= $value. ", ";
00100                     }
00101                     $data = rtrim ($data, ", ");
00102                     $data .= " }";
00103                 }
00104                 $data .= "\"";
00105 
00106                 if ($rule['comment']) {
00107                     $data .= " \t# ". trim(stripslashes($rule['comment']));
00108                 }
00109                 $data .= "\n";
00110             }
00111             $data .= "\n";
00112         }
00113         return $data;
00114     }
00115     
00116     function _has_macro ($array)
00117     {
00118         $return = false;
00119         foreach ($array as $value) {
00120             if ($value{0} == "$") {
00121                 $return = true;
00122             }
00123         }
00124         return $return;
00125     }
00126 }
